Social Services

There are many charities, voluntary organisations and clubs that organise leisure and social activities in the area, which are targetted at specific groups of people (ie. people with disabilities, elderly, ethnic communities, etc).

Use the following list of contacts and become involved in a leisure/social activity that suits you. The list also indicates which specific group of people it targets and the times and dates that they meet.
